title: Watch Face - Urban Pro
summary: Urban Pro is simple and curious watch face from the 80s!
description: Urban Pro is simple and curious watch face from the 80s!Key features:★ Hourly vibration★ Date★ Double time★ Ambient mode★ Round (Moto 360, LG G Watch R) and Square (LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, ASUS ZenWatch, Sony Smartwath 3) designHourly vibration, second arrow, date and time is configured in the settings of your watch.INSTALL NOTES:After installing the application, new styles of watches appear in the menu selection of watch faces in your Android Wear after 10-20 seconds. If you encounter problems with the installation of watch faces on Wear, please go to the android wear app -> Settings and "Resync apps"
descriptionHTML:
Urban Pro is simple and curious watch face from the 80s!

Key features:
★ Hourly vibration
★ Date
★ Double time
★ Ambient mode
★ Round (Moto 360, LG G Watch R) and Square (LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, ASUS ZenWatch, Sony Smartwath 3) design

Hourly vibration, second arrow, date and time is configured in the settings of your watch.

INSTALL NOTES:
After installing the application, new styles of watches appear in the menu selection of watch faces in your Android Wear after 10-20 seconds. If you encounter problems with the installation of watch faces on Wear, please go to the android wear app -> Settings and "Resync apps"
recentChanges: 6) Setting the display time and hours
